text: [Ej muşrikon] Agar xohoni pirūzī [ʙar musulmonon va farorasidani azoʙi ilohī hasted], inak pirūzii [Islom, ki ʙuzurgtarin ranç va azoʙi şumost] ʙa suroƣaton omad.Va agar [az kufru duşmanī ʙo pajomʙar] dast ʙardored, on [kor] ʙarojaton ʙehtar ast, va [-le] agar [ʙa çang ʙo musulmonon] ʙargarded, mo niz ʙarmegardem.Va [inro ʙidoned] ki gurūhi şumo, harcand zijod ʙoşad, hargiz nametavonad şumoro az cize ʙenijoz kunad va [digar] inki [hamvora] Alloh taolo ʙo mu'minon ast
